system.descriptor: Become an agent of one of the Imperium's many organisations, and work for it as well as for your crew. But if push comes to shove, the organisation comes first.
system.uses: Gain Writ of Authority Trait, and gain Peer(X) for relevent organisation (Arbites, Mechanicus, Administratum, Ecclesiarchy, Government, Inquisition, or Military), can spend further XP to gain Common and Forbidden Lore, as well as other benefits relevent to the organisation. (See RT: Into the Storm, page 104 for "Agent of the Throne" List of purchasable advances).
